lead_paragraph: Manager Juergen Klopp has urged Liverpool to concentrate on isolating returning Manchester City striker Sergio Aguero when the teams meet at Anfield in the Premier League on Saturday.

headline.print_headline: Klopp Looks to Cut Off Supply to Returning Aguero
headline.main: Klopp Looks to Cut Off Supply to Returning Aguero

snippet: Manager Juergen Klopp has urged Liverpool to concentrate on isolating returning Manchester City striker Sergio Aguero when the teams meet at Anfield in the Premier League on Saturday....
